title: Lough Ree Park Walking Trail Route

images.title: Arno-nl, CC BY-SA 4.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Lough Ree

images.title: Arno-nl, CC BY-SA 4.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Lough Ree

description: This short walk visits the beautiful Lough Ree on the River Shannon. The lake is located near the town of Athlone on the border of the counties of Longford and Westmeath. You can pick up the walking trail on the southern side of the lake at Coosan Point. Here you will find a good sized car park and the Lough Ree Inn. From here you can head down to the lakeside and pick up a surfaced footpath along the water in Lough Ree Park. The park includes in a playground, picnic area and a nice wide lawn to relax on in summer. After your walk you could enjoy some refreshments at the Lough Ree Inn. They serve a good range of meals and have a nice outdoor seating area overlooking the lake.
